verses.text: \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w*, thou hast been our dwelling \w place|strong="H4583"\w* in \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w generations|strong="H1755"\w*.\f + \fr 90.1 \ft A Prayer…: or, A Prayer, being a Psalm of Moses\f*\f + \fr 90.1 \ft in…: Heb. in generation and generation\f*

Before the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* were brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w*, or ever thou hadst \w formed|strong="H2342"\w* the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* and the \w world|strong="H8398"\w*, even from \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w everlasting|strong="H5769"\w*, thou \add art\add* \w God|strong="H0410"\w*.

Thou \w turnest|strong="H7725"\w* \w man|strong="H0582"\w* to \w destruction|strong="H1793"\w*; and \w sayest|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, ye \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*.

For a \w thousand|strong="H0505"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* in thy \w sight|strong="H5869"\w* \add are but\add* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H0865"\w* when it is \w past|strong="H5674"\w*, and \add as\add* a \w watch|strong="H0821"\w* in the \w night|strong="H3915"\w*.\f + \fr 90.4 \ft when…: or, when he hath passed them\f*

Thou carriest them away as with a \w flood|strong="H2229"\w*; they are \add as\add* a \w sleep|strong="H8142"\w*: in the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* \add they are\add* like \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \add which\add* groweth \w up|strong="H2498"\w*.\f + \fr 90.5 \ft groweth…: or, is changed\f*

In the \w morning|strong="H1242"\w* it \w flourisheth|strong="H6692"\w*, and groweth \w up|strong="H2498"\w*; in the \w evening|strong="H6153"\w* it is cut \w down|strong="H4135"\w*, and \w withereth|strong="H3001"\w*.
For we are \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* by thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, and by thy \w wrath|strong="H2534"\w* are we \w troubled|strong="H0926"\w*.

Thou hast \w set|strong="H7896"\w* our \w iniquities|strong="H5771"\w* before thee, our \w secret|strong="H5956"\w* \add sins\add* in the \w light|strong="H3974"\w* of thy \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*.

For all our \w days|strong="H3117"\w* are passed \w away|strong="H6437"\w* in thy \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*: we \w spend|strong="H3615"\w* our \w years|strong="H8141"\w* as a \w tale|strong="H1899"\w* \add that is told\add*.\f + \fr 90.9 \ft passed…: Heb. turned away\f*\f + \fr 90.9 \ft as a…: or, as a meditation\f*

The \w days|strong="H3117"\w* of our \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \add are\add* \w threescore|strong="H7657"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w* and \w ten|strong="H7657"\w*; and if by reason of \w strength|strong="H1369"\w* \add they be\add* \w fourscore|strong="H8084"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*, yet \add is\add* their \w strength|strong="H7296"\w* \w labour|strong="H5999"\w* and \w sorrow|strong="H0205"\w*; for it is \w soon|strong="H2440"\w* cut \w off|strong="H1468"\w*, and we fly \w away|strong="H5774"\w*.\f + \fr 90.10 \ft The days…: Heb. As for the days of our years, in them are seventy years\f*
Who \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* the \w power|strong="H5797"\w* of thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*? even according to thy \w fear|strong="H3374"\w*, \add so is\add* thy \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*.

So \w teach|strong="H3045"\w* \add us\add* to \w number|strong="H4487"\w* our \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, that we may \w apply|strong="H0935"\w* \add our\add* \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* unto \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*.\f + \fr 90.12 \ft apply: Heb. cause to come\f*
\w Return|strong="H7725"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, how long? and let it \w repent|strong="H5162"\w* thee concerning thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*.

O \w satisfy|strong="H7646"\w* us \w early|strong="H1242"\w* with thy \w mercy|strong="H2617"\w*; that we may \w rejoice|strong="H7442"\w* and be \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* all our \w days|strong="H3117"\w*.

Make us \w glad|strong="H8055"\w* according to the \w days|strong="H3117"\w* \add wherein\add* thou hast \w afflicted|strong="H6031"\w* us, \add and\add* the \w years|strong="H8141"\w* \add wherein\add* we have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w*.
Let thy \w work|strong="H6467"\w* \w appear|strong="H7200"\w* unto thy \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, and thy \w glory|strong="H1926"\w* unto their \w children|strong="H1121"\w*.

And let the \w beauty|strong="H5278"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* our \w God|strong="H0430"\w* be upon us: and \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* thou the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* upon us; yea, the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* thou it.
